name: Instability (itch) (r3nn1)
description:
Source Code: https://github.com/oxi-dev0/Instability-LD49

Instability is a physics based infinite platformer. Quickly swing on damaged ropes while platforms fall around you during your escape from the Anomaly. Try to travel the farthest distance you can without dying. Post your highscores in the comments!

Gifs

How to play
  • Your goal is to travel the farthest distance possible without dying.
  • Unstable platforms and ropes randomly snap and fall while you weave throughout them
  • An Anomaly chases you throughout, trying to erase you.
Controls
  • A and D for movement
  • Tap space for jump
  • Hold space to hold on to a rope
Notes
  • I have not tested this on resolutions other than 4K, if there are issues i will make a patch build
  • The game has quite a steep learning curve, but is very fun once you get used to it
  • The game is quite difficult right now and may be frustrating, please leave feedback in the comments.
Thanks for playing! Leave your feedback in the comments!
